scripts.start:php: node -e "import('./php-manager.js').then(async m => { const alive = await m.phpManager.isAlive(); if (!alive) { console.log('Starting PHP...'); await m.phpManager.start(); } else { console.log('PHP already running'); } process.stdin.resume(); })"
scripts.check:php: node -e "import('./php-manager.js').then(async m => console.log('PHP Server:', await m.phpManager.isAlive() ? '✅ Running on port 8000' : '❌ Stopped'))"
scripts.setup: echo 'First-time setup...' && npm run email:setup && echo 'Setup complete!'
scripts.monitor: echo '=== Velura Backend Monitor ===' && echo 'PHP Status:' && npm run check:php && echo 'Express Status:' && curl -s http://localhost:5000/health | grep -o '"status":"[^"]*"' | sed 's/"status":"//;s/"//' && echo 'Errors:' && tail -n 5 logs/errors-$(date +%Y-%m-%d).log 2>/dev/null || echo 'No error logs today'
